Secondly, Olive oil contains nutrients that fight inflammation. These include oleic acid as well as the antioxidant oleocanthal.
Thirdly,

I love this pump. Itï¿½s got a really strong suction, which comes with a little extra noise, but thatï¿½s okay in my book. Just wanted to make an honest review.
I do wish that it came with small sized flanges; the ones that came with are probably a 28mm and I use a 20mm. You can use other flanges but you have to buy parts to make it work.
But, besides that, a great pump. Portable, long battery, strong suction, great price.

I really like this pump. Not only is it easy to use and very portable it helped me with clogged milk ducts and engorement by using the frequency conversion. That setting helped suck very gently then made one or two large sucks and it helped my slow let down and clogs tremendously. It is pretty noisy but I'm not too worried about it.

wow this little pump really has suction power! I originally got the freemie for my portable pump but after 2 months it quit taking a charge so I needed a replacement and since this was 1/3 the price I didn't expect much, but its 3ï¿½ the suction power of my freemie and has better settings as well, the only thing I could add is it definitely needs a clip for better portability but besides that I LOVE this thing

I absolutely love this double breast pump. Last pregnancy I ordered an avent single breast pump this time I wanted to try something a bit more affordable and let me tell you you wonï¿½t regret getting this pump. I love the various suction settings  ?? so I can remain consistent with each breast while pumping.

Itï¿½s got really great suction (although itï¿½s strong so you gotta be careful) and Iï¿½m able to get more milk than with my medela and spectra. It has different settings which is really nice for me because Iï¿½m able to have more letdowns. The battery holds up nicely and itï¿½s great not being stuck to the wall.

With my first child, insurance covered my breast pump. This time, my insurance wouldn't so I had to find an affordable pump that would be easy to transport to and from work. My first pump also didn't seem to work well and I ultimately have up trying to pump and stayed home rather than returning to work. This time around, I can't afford to stay home so I was very pleased that the very first time pumping yielded quite a bit for being 5 days post partum. This pump is small and rechargable so you don't have to be tethered to a wall. You can pump wherever you need to quietly. You also have many suction options to choose from to ensure you get the correct speed and power you need.

I LOVE THIS BREAST PUMP. When I purchased this pump I bought it because someone said it was better than the spectre 2 which was recommended by my lactation specialist. The reviewer was right. This pump produces the best results of the 3 pumps I have. To make things better itï¿½s portable. Itï¿½s easy for me to pump where ever without being big, bulky, or loud. There are multiple level and combination to choose from to make you feel comfortable. I find the combinations help me produce more milk because itï¿½s more realistic and similar to the babyï¿½s suckling habits. Also, it comes with attachments to store your milk right away. I could go on and on but if youï¿½re struggling with finding a pump
Buy this one.

I initially bought this pump because I failed at getting a pump through my insurance in time and this was just going to ï¿½hopefullyï¿½ get me through until I got that pump. Well, I never got that pump and I LOVE this pump. Itï¿½s portable, charges on USB, and comes with all the necessary accessories. It holds a charge really well and I can get through several pumping sessions before needing to recharge it. Suction is great and there are so many different settings to choose from. I really couldnï¿½t be more pleased with this product.

As an exclusively pumping mom, this is a great pump to use on the go or when you donï¿½t have time to be attached to the couch. Not only is it portable, making it easier to do things around the house and care for baby, but it has pretty decent suction power. I use it with my spectra parts and freemie cups, and it works well with both. The only thing I wish it had was a screen ï¿½holdï¿½ button. I carry it around in a bag and a light touch can manipulate the screen. The battery power is decent enough to get a few pumps before needing to charge.

I love this pump. I am a first time breast feeder and my baby was preemie and can't latch. I wanted to try pumping so I ordered this without any expectations. But wow! It's good. It's every bit as powerful as the hospital one I used after delivery.

I bought this after seeing my friend using it, Iï¿½d never even heard of it before. This was mainly ordered just to catch all the milk I was losing from the breast that my son was not nursing from during feeding, since the one he isnï¿½t latched to ALWAYS leaks. I ended up using it and was really shocked to see that I got a whole once from the breast he was not latched to! Such a fantastic purchase! Just make sure you are careful after you detach it... because I dropped it all over me while trying to unlatch the baby and stand up.

I waited a while to write this review. I have been using this breast pump for the last 10 months and let me tell you, it is money well spent!! The cost is very reasonable but the pump is the same quality as you would get with a much more expensive pump. I was given a plug-in Spectra by my insurance and have only used it a handful of times. I prefer to use this pump. The battery lasts a long time between charges, the suction is outstanding, the noise level isnï¿½t too loud, the portability is the best. I keep it plugged into my car when I need to charge it and it is compact enough to bring to work. It has different levels of suction and different modes but I always use the same one. Buy it, you wonï¿½t be sorry!!

* Tomatoes: Fresh, received in mix sizes, both big & small, red fresh tomatoes! 9/10

* Brinjal: Very fresh, all of them was really fresh 10/10

* Carrots, Spring Onion, Bund Gobi: Fresh, nicely wrapped 10/10
